articles.description: Riding the floating rocket, Justin Bieber opened his fourth appearance in Des Moines at Wells Fargo Arena with "Somebody" off his sixth studio album, "Justice."
articles.content:
Cases of Bieber fever have skyrocketed in Iowa for the first time in six years.
Justin Bieber, the Canadian-born pop star and teenage heartthrob, greeted more than 12,000 fans at Wells Fargo Arena S… [+3752 chars]
